department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 29 August 2023 at 14:00 EDT. All bids submitted after 14:00 EDT will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. Contractor must supply labour, materials and equipment necessary for diagnostic, repairing and rebuilding services of hydraulic and pneumatic systems for various types of equipment and vehicles (commercial and military pattern).  All work must be performed on an as and when required basis for Transportation Electrical and Mechanical Engineering Flight (TEME Flt), 8 Wing Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Trenton.
full_summary:
# Request for Standing Offer - W0125-24WR08 Hydraulic System Repair

## Contract Information

* **Contract Reference:** WS4139167683-Doc4139307698
* **Solicitation Number:** WS4139167683
* **Publication Date:** August 9, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** August 29, 2023 (2 PM EDT); amendments to the opening and submission times were made. 
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** December 1, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date:** November 30, 2026

## Contract Description

The Department of Public Works and Government Services is seeking a contractor for a Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) for the Repair and Maintenance of Hydraulic and Pneumatic Systems. The contractor will be required to supply labour, materials, and equipment for the diagnosis, repairing and rebuilding of Hydraulic and Pneumatic Systems on various types of vehicles and equipment,  as and when required. The work must be performed on an on-demand basis.

## Procurement Method

* **Procurement Category:** SRV
* **Request Type:** Request for Standing Offer
* **Method of Procurement:** Competitive Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** The project will be awarded to the contractor with the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.

## Point of Contact

* **Name:** Darlene Keenan
* **Email:** darlene.keenan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca 
* **Additional Contact Information:** None 

For information and documentation submission, access the announcement through the Ariba Discovery portal [1](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17120943?extsite=MTcxMjA5NDNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

End of rewritten entry.
